data.title: Health Clinic in Fredericktown, PA
data.meta_description: Centerville Clinics provides total health care to the entire community of Fredericktown, PA, and surrounding areas. Find a location near you & call us today!
data.text:
Welcome to Centerville Clinics

Providing Medical, Dental, & Behavioral Healthcare

Centerville Clinics provides high-quality, comprehensive healthcare to 40,000 patients Fayette/Greene/Washington Counties. We operate 12 medical, 5 dental, and 10 behavioral health sites located in the tri-county area. We also offer specialty medical care, laboratory, X-ray services, and a black lung clinic program, for those with pulmonary diseases.

Behavioral Healthcare

Centerville Clinics offers direct Behavioral Health Care and also provides referrals to numerous county and community programs. All services are confidential.

Dental Services

Centerville Clinics provides complete dental services to meet your dental health care and treatment needs. Many services can be completed in one convenient appointment.

Medical Services

If you wish to learn more about the services Centerville Clinics Inc. provides or inquire about employment opportunities please contact us.

Centerville Clinics is a Health Center Program grantee under 42 U.S.C. 254b, and a deemed Public Health Service employee under 42 U.S.C. 233(g)-(n). This health center receives HHS funding and has Federal PHS deemed status with respect to certain health or health-related claims, including medical malpractice claims, for itself and its covered individuals. Sliding Fee Discount Program: A Sliding Fee Discount Program will be provided to eligible persons based on the patientâ€™s ability to pay. Ability to pay is determined by the household size and annual income relative to a discount schedule based on federal poverty income guidelines. Centerville Clinics Inc. serves all patients regardless of ability to pay.
